Hey Spidey,

As It Is Said In The Program "* Make Sure You've Got Drivers Installed For Your Device.
      * Enable "USB DEBUGGING" 
   (MenuSettingsApplicationsDevelopment)
      * Enable "UNKNOWN SOURCES"
      (MenuSettingsApplications)
      * Connect USB Cable To The Device"

Hence, It Shall Support All Android Devices Like This.

Have A Nice Day!
